Texts.Eng: Bring the ^orange;mead^reset; to ^green;the drunk^reset; at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;
Texts.Chs: 把^orange;蜂蜜酒^reset;带回^orange;科学前哨站^reset;给^green;我^reset;。

Texts.Eng: I's not able ter *hic* do much ter help. Make ^green;mead^white;. Hard work. You'll need to find shome ^orange;pure honey^white; and purpare fer a complimicated brewing process. Bring some for me to *hic* taste when you're done!
Texts.Chs: 我已经，*嗝*，没有东西可以教你了。要酿^green;蜂蜜酒^white;你得要找到一些^orange;纯蜂蜜^white;，请好好的感受一下用心酿酒的过程吧！当你酿出来后，请务必给，*嗝*，我带点！

Texts.Eng: You did it. Now you can truly call yourself a brewer.
Texts.Chs: 你真的做到了！现在你可以称呼自己为酿酒大师了。
